head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KAY, ABNER I.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KAY, ABNER I.

block.p: KAY-Abner I., 85. Of Lake Worth, FL. Passed away August 17, 2000. Beloved husband of Helen for 55 years. Loving father of Harold (Cynthia) Kay, Richard (Kathy) Kay and Jonathan (Patricia) Kay. Cherished grandfather of David, Jana, Jeffrey, Michael and Melanie. Graveside services 11:00 AM Sunday at Wellwood Cemetery, Pine Lawn, Long Island, NY.

KAY-Abner I., 85. Of Lake Worth, FL. Passed away August 17, 2000. Beloved husband of Helen for 55 years. Loving father of Harold (Cynthia) Kay, Richard (Kathy) Kay and Jonathan (Patricia) Kay. Cherished grandfather of David, Jana, Jeffrey, Michael and Melanie. Graveside services 11:00 AM Sunday at Wellwood Cemetery, Pine Lawn, Long Island, NY.
